Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: use correct Tailwind v4 import syntax

The old v3-style imports \(@import "tailwindcss/preflight" and
"tailwindcss/utilities"\) were missing the theme layer, causing
most utility classes to not generate. Tailwind v4 uses a single
@import "tailwindcss" that includes all layers.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
